solution_line_template: Kim got {candy_bars_per_week} candy bars a week for {total_weeks} weeks so she got {candy_bars_per_week}*{total_weeks} = <<{candy_bars_per_week}*{total_weeks}={total_candy_bars_received}>>{total_candy_bars_received} candy bars

She would only eat {eaten_per_period} candy bar every {weeks_per_eaten_bar} weeks so in {total_weeks} weeks she only ate {total_weeks}/{weeks_per_eaten_bar} = <<{total_weeks}/{weeks_per_eaten_bar}={total_candy_bars_eaten}>>{total_candy_bars_eaten} candy bars

She saved {total_candy_bars_received} candy bars and only ate {total_candy_bars_eaten} so she still has {total_candy_bars_received}-{total_candy_bars_eaten} = <<{total_candy_bars_received}-{total_candy_bars_eaten}={candy_bars_saved}>>{candy_bars_saved} candy bars
